texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: When the user send request to the website, firewall intercepts and run security checks.
texts.text: When the user send request to the website, firewall intercepts and run security checks.

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: Then the request is forwarded to DNS Server which translates the request to web server ip address.
texts.text: Then the request is forwarded to DNS Server which translates the request to web server ip address.

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: Then the request is forwarded to the load balancer which forwards it to the web server.
texts.text: Then the request is forwarded to the load balancer which forwards it to the web server.

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: Static files are hosted at the web server.
texts.text: Static files are hosted at the web server.

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: Web server forwards the request to App Server
texts.text: Web server forwards the request to App Server

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: User Profiles and activity data is hosted in Redis.
texts.text: User Profiles and activity data is hosted in Redis.

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: App Server gathers the user information from Redis and rest of the data from SQL Server
texts.text: App Server gathers the user information from Redis and rest of the data from SQL Server

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: And then the request is sent back to the front.
texts.text: And then the request is sent back to the front.
